verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came also to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying,
You shall not <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife,<s%> neither shall you have <S%H1121>sons<s%> or <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> in this <S%H4725>place.<s%>

For thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> concerning the <S%H1121>sons<s%> and concerning the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> who are <S%H3205>born<s%> in this <S%H4725>place,<s%> and concerning their <S%H517>mothers<s%> who <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H1>them,<s%> and concerning their fathers who became their <S%H3209>father<s%> in this <S%H776>land:<s%>

They shall <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H8463>grievous<s%> <S%H4463>deaths:<s%> they shall not be <S%H5594>lamented,<s%> neither shall they be <S%H6912>buried;<s%> they shall be as <S%H1828>dung<s%> on the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H127>ground;<s%> and they shall be <S%H3615>consumed<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and by <S%H7458>famine;<s%> and their dead <S%H5038>bodies<s%> shall be <S%H3978>food<s%> for the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and for the <S%H929>animals<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

For thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H935>Don't<s%> enter into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4798>mourning,<s%> neither <S%H3212>go<s%> to <S%H5594>lament,<s%> neither <S%H5110>bemoan<s%> <S%H622>them;<s%> for I have taken away my <S%H7965>peace<s%> from this <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> even loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> and tender <S%H7356>mercies.<s%>

Both <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H6996>small<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%> in this <S%H776>land;<s%> they shall not be <S%H6912>buried,<s%> neither shall men <S%H5594>lament<s%> for <S%H1413>them,<s%> nor cut <S%H7139>themselves,<s%> nor make themselves bald for them;

neither shall men <S%H6536>break<s%> bread for them in <S%H60>mourning,<s%> to <S%H5162>comfort<s%> them for the <S%H4191>dead;<s%> neither shall men give them the <S%H3563>cup<s%> of <S%H8575>consolation<s%> to <S%H8248>drink<s%> for their <S%H1>father<s%> or for their <S%H517>mother.<s%>
You shall not <S%H935>go<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4960>feasting<s%> to <S%H3427>sit<s%> with <S%H398>them,<s%> to eat and to <S%H8354>drink.<s%>

For thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H7673>Behold,<s%> I will cause to cease out of this <S%H4725>place,<s%> before your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> and in your <S%H3117>days,<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8342>mirth<s%> and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8057>gladness,<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H2860>bridegroom<s%> and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3618>bride.<s%>

It shall <S%H5046>happen,<s%> when you shall show this <S%H5971>people<s%> all these <S%H1697>words,<s%> and they shall <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H3068>you,<s%> Why has Yahweh <S%H1696>pronounced<s%> all this <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> against <S%H5771>us?<s%> or what is our iniquity? or what is our <S%H2403>sin<s%> that we have <S%H2398>committed<s%> against <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God?<s%>

Then you shall <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H1>them,<s%> Because your fathers have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> <S%H5002>me,<s%> says <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and have <S%H3212>walked<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> and have <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H7812>them,<s%> and have worshiped <S%H5800>them,<s%> and have forsaken <S%H8104>me,<s%> and have not kept my <S%H8451>law;<s%>

and you have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H7489>evil<s%> more than your <S%H1>fathers;<s%> <S%H2009>for,<s%> behold, you <S%H1980>walk<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H8307>stubbornness<s%> of his <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H3820>heart,<s%> so that you <S%H8085>don't<s%> listen to me:

therefore will I <S%H2904>cast<s%> you forth out of this <S%H776>land<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> that you have not <S%H3045>known,<s%> neither you nor your <S%H1>fathers;<s%> and there you shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night;<s%> for I will <S%H5414>show<s%> you no <S%H2594>favor.<s%>

<S%H3117>Therefore,<s%> behold, the days <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> that it shall no more be <S%H559>said,<s%> As <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> who brought <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%>

<S%H3068>but,<s%> As Yahweh <S%H2416>lives,<s%> who brought <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6828>north,<s%> and from all the <S%H776>countries<s%> where he had <S%H5080>driven<s%> <S%H7725>them.<s%> I will bring them again into their <S%H127>land<s%> that I <S%H5414>gave<s%> to their <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

<S%H7971>Behold,<s%> I will send for <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1771>fishermen,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and they shall <S%H1770>fish<s%> them <S%H310>up;<s%> and afterward I will <S%H7971>send<s%> for <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H6719>hunters,<s%> and they shall <S%H6679>hunt<s%> them from every <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> and from every <S%H1389>hill,<s%> and out of the <S%H5357>clefts<s%> of the <S%H5553>rocks.<s%>

For my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are on all their <S%H1870>ways;<s%> they are not <S%H5641>hidden<s%> from my <S%H6440>face,<s%> neither is their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> <S%H6845>concealed<s%> <S%H5048>from<s%> my <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

<S%H7223>First<s%> I will <S%H7999>recompense<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> and their <S%H2403>sin<s%> <S%H4932>double,<s%> because they have <S%H2490>polluted<s%> my <S%H776>land<s%> with the <S%H5038>carcasses<s%> of their <S%H8251>detestable<s%> <S%H4390>things,<s%> and have filled my <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> with their <S%H8441>abominations.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> my <S%H5797>strength,<s%> and my <S%H5797>stronghold,<s%> and my <S%H4498>refuge<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H6869>affliction,<s%> to you shall the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> from the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and shall <S%H559>say,<s%> Our <S%H1>fathers<s%> have <S%H5157>inherited<s%> nothing but <S%H8267>lies,<s%> <S%H1892>vanity<s%> and things in which there is no <S%H3276>profit.<s%>
Shall a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H6213>make<s%> to himself <S%H430>gods,<s%> which yet are no <S%H430>gods?<s%>

<S%H3045>Therefore,<s%> behold, I will cause them to know, this <S%H6471>once<s%> will I cause them to <S%H3045>know<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> and my <S%H1369>might;<s%> and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that my <S%H8034>name<s%> is <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
